channel.title: michael on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in michael on Barefoot Rob

item.title: snack with Michael
item.description: 23:56 Tuesday 30 April 2019 JST At Mark’s suggestion, Michael and I ate at a restaurant in Noborito where we talked about Marble Track 3. I showed him the secret backend of Marble Track 3 where I have “episodes” showing the 300+ hours of livestreams for creating the animation of the construction..

item.title: with Kai and Mika met Mike at The Pink Cow
item.description: 08:06 Friday 18 May 2018 JST 昨日ピンクカウ美佳さんと佳依さんと会って楽しみました。 Had a good time chilling with Kai and Mika at The Pink Cow last night. マイケルさんも会った。彼が世界の1番よくなバーテンダーでしたって。We also met Michael. He said he’s the worlds best bartender. そうでもそうでもないわからないけど、彼と面白い話できた。I don’t know if that’s true, but we had a good time talking to him. 美佳さんと佳依さんと日本語でも英語でも喋りました。I spoke in Japanese and English with Kai and Mika. 戸からピンポン音はピッザヂリベリかたが来た。みんながびっくりした。笑 Everyone was surprised when we heard a knock at the door; it was a pizza delivery guy.

item.title: Shimoda Weekend
item.description: 13:39 Tuesday 07 November 2017 JST Okay it’s been a couple days, but we had a lovely weekend in Shimoda. So glad that Lin joined us! She said she had a great time. The weekend schedule was kinda freestyle, which caused a bit of consternation for some, but did not affect things too badly. I enjoyed getting to know everyone a bit better. Yoga on Saturday morning was originally led by Lisa, but turned into acro yoga with people being angels, superman, partners, flippers, etc.

item.title: hung out with Michael near Noborito
item.description: 00:08 Saturday 09 September 2017 JST First time to hang out with Michael one on one. We ate at a cafe in the station and then went barefoot out on a balcony where we talked to a mom waiting for her kid to come back from school. Michael chatted with her a bit, introducing us.. I was kinda amazed because even though my Japanese is better, I’m not as willing to break the ice with people.
